
```
---
- hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
  - name: Install htop
    ansible.builtin.apt:
      name: htop 
```

```
---
- hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
  - name: Install htop
    ansible.builtin.apt:
      name: htop
  - name: Install git
    ansible.builtin.apt:
      name: git
  - name: Install vim-nox
    ansible.builtin.apt:
      name: vim-nox 
```

```
---
- hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
  - name: Install packages
    ansible.builtin.apt:
      name:
        - git 
        - htop
        - vim-nox 
```

```
---
- hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
  - name: copy SSH motd
    ansible.builtin.copy:
      src: motd
      dest: /etc/motd 
```

```
---
- hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
  - name: Install Apache
    ansible.builtin.apt:
      name: apache2 
```

```
---
- hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
  - name: Install Apache
    ansible.builtin.apt:
      name: apache2
  **- name: Start the apache2 services**
    **ansible.builtin.service:**
      **name: apache2**
      **state: started** 
```

```
- name: Start the apache2 services
    ansible.builtin.service:
    name: apache2
    state: started
    **enabled: true** 
```

``` Ansible is awesome!

Ansible is amazing. With just a small text file, we automated the setup of a web server!

```

```
---
- hosts: all
  become: true
  tasks:
  - name: Install Apache
    ansible.builtin.apt:
     name: apache2
  - name: Start the apache2 services
    ansible.builtin.service:
      name: apache2
      state: started

  **- name: Copy index.xhtml**
    **ansible.builtin.copy:**
      **src: index.xhtml**
      **dest: /var/www/html/index.xhtml** 
```

```
---
**- hosts: localhost**
  become: true
  tasks:
  - name: Install Apache
    ansible.builtin.apt: name=apache2
  - name: Start the apache2 services
    ansible.builtin.service:
      name: apache2
      state: started
  - name: Copy index.xhtml
    ansible.builtin.copy:
      src: index.xhtml
      dest: /var/www/html/index.xhtml 
```
